text: @realDonaldTrump You, as well as other adolescent minds, thought it a great idea to have taxpayers pay for a national airshow as people & businesses are going broke & when you can't provide sufficient coronavirus testing for us. Or is that Obama's fault, or Hillary's, or China's, or the states...
